    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public static UserManager authenticate(String wso2Url,
                                       String wso2User,
                                       String wso2Password,
                                       Properties configProps)
                                throws UserManagerException
        Authenticate against a WSO2 G-Reg server and obtain a UserManager instance
        Parameters:
        wso2Url - The WSO2 G-Reg service URL
        wso2User - The username to authenticate to G-Reg (must have admin privileges)
        wso2Password - The password for the WSO2 user
        configProps - The HTRC configuration properties to use
        Returns:
        An instance of UserManager
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - Thrown if the authentication failed or there was an error communicating with the server

      • createUser

        public void createUser(String userName,
                       String password,
                       org.wso2.carbon.user.mgt.stub.types.carbon.ClaimValue[] claims,
                       String[] permissions)
                throws UserManagerException
        Create a new user for the HTRC platform
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name
        password - The user's password
        claims - The ClaimValue[] array of profile claims (see available claims)
        permissions - The array of permission keys to assign to the user, for example: "/permission/admin/login" (can be null)
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - Thrown if an error occurred
        See Also:
        getRequiredUserClaims(), getAvailablePermissions()

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(String userName,
                       boolean deleteHome)
                throws UserManagerException
        Delete an existing user
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name to delete
        deleteHome - True to delete the user's home in the registry, False otherwise
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - Thrown if an error occurred

      • changePassword

        public void changePassword(String userName,
                           String newPassword)
                    throws UserManagerException
        Change a user's password
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name
        newPassword - The new password
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - Thrown if an error occurred

      • getRoles

        public Set<String> getRoles(String userName)
                     throws UserManagerException
        Get the list roles (if userName == null, then return all roles, otherwise return user's roles)
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name (can be null)
        Returns:
        The set of role names
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - Thrown if an error occurred

      • getUserNames

        public Set<String> getUserNames(String filter)
                         throws UserManagerException
        Get the list of user names (matching a filter)
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter to use when retrieving the user names ("*" = retrieve all users; "bo*" = retrieve all users whose user name starts with "bo")
        Returns:
        The set of user names
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - Thrown if an error occurred

      • getRequiredUserClaims

        public String[] getRequiredUserClaims()
                               throws UserManagerException
        Get the list of required user claims (expected to be supplied as part of the createUser request)
        Returns:
        The array of required user claims
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - Thrown if an error occurred

      • getAvailablePermissions

        public Map<String,String> getAvailablePermissions()
                                           throws UserManagerException
        Get the list of available role permissions
        Returns:
        A Map<String,String> of available role permissions, where the key represents the permission key, and the value provides a human readable name for the permission
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - Thrown if an error occurred

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception
